dialogue.text: GH... How Do You Not Understand, That She Is Just Using You For Her Own Success?
Like She Used Me Once, NOW LOOK WHO I AM, JUST A FLOATING SKULL WITH AN INVISIBLE BODY, I'VE LOST EVERYTHING!
Beb Bop Beb Bob Skbob Dop
This is your last chance to leave, I-I Won't Stop Until I GET MY HANDS ON THAT LITTLE BRAT, LEAVE NOW OR FACE THE CONSEQUENCES
Very well then, I Didn't Want It To End This Way, But, I GUESS I WILL JUST KILL THE BOTH OF YOU!
